title: Tassel, 17th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: braided and knotted
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Linen tassel, braided and knotted. Loop attached to pear shaped tassel from which hang four elements in shape of human figures, attached to one another. From tassel, bottom center, hangs another knotted element.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tassel, 17th century.
17th century. Medium: linen
Technique: braided and knotted. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-51-35.
